supply.v: Farmgate prices hit target VND 100.4k/kg. Farmers selling to repay debts and prepare for Tet. 20-25% of trees in blossoming stage.
Cyclone Seedling 91S and excessive rain causing cherry drop in Temanggung (Central Java). Southern Sumatra remains average.
Total 2025 shipments hit 40.049M bags. Germany (5.4M) overtook USA (5.3M) as the #1 destination. Dec exports were low at 3.13M bags.
Main Drugar crop flow has stopped; Kampala availability scarce. Fly crop expected to start in early March.

demand.v: Davos dominated by AI and great-power politics. Global growth resilient despite U.S.-linked trade tensions.
President Noboa announced a 30% tariff on all Colombian products, citing security/drug trafficking concerns.

stocks.v: 442,459 bags. Marginal weekly increase. Shipments to the board are being discussed as potential relief.
4,532 lots. Increase driven by Indonesian gradings to satisfy January deliveries.

futures.v: Arabica estimated net long 18k lots. Robusta estimated net long 5k lots.
KC Support: 344.5, 334.3. Resistance: 380, 400. RC Support: 3665, 3500. Resistance: 4070, 4525.

alerts.v: Heavy rainfall and low temperatures complicating harvesting; wet parchment holding at LPS 5,900/qnt.
Country 60% sold. Election Feb 2 creating a cautious market mood.
